welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Glendale, where charm and beauty meet in the heart of the United States. Known for its vibrant arts scene, historic downtown, and diverse culinary options, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Phoenix Deer Valley Airport, serving commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Phoenix Deer Valley Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Litchfield Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Litchfield Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buckeye Municipal Airport serves all commercial flights and includes various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Buckeye Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
